daily.text: The more natural or eco-based products you can introduce into your beauty regimen, the more beneficial it is for your skin. It's similar to introducing organic food into your daily diet.
daily.author: Ivanka Trump

daily.text: My philosophy from day one is that I can sleep better at night if I can improve an individual's knowledge about food and wine, and do it on a daily basis.
daily.author: Emeril Lagasse

daily.text: By fundamentally changing how we design the places and systems that enable our daily lives, we can slash emissions way beyond the immediate carbon savings - because our own personal emissions are just the tip of a vast iceberg of energy and resources consumed far from our view.
daily.author: Alex Steffen

daily.text: The Bible is an ocean of instruction and wisdom. Dip daily into the vast pool to discover its truths.
daily.author: Elizabeth George

daily.text: I found that dance, music, and literature is how I made sense of the world... It pushed me to think of things bigger than life's daily routines... To think beyond what is immediate or convenient.
daily.author: Mikhail Baryshnikov

daily.text: Your daily output is directly proportional to your daily thoughts while your activity or passivity remains as a constant. You get what you think to do provided you do it!
daily.author: Israelmore Ayivor

daily.text: Prior to getting into music, I interacted with, on a daily basis, about 5-10 percent of the people that I've interacted with since then. I've been meeting people from different backgrounds and different cultures. That did allow for a lot of change. I've changed as a product of that, but it's been positive.
daily.author: Sam Hunt

daily.text: For every disadvantage there is a corresponding advantage.
daily.author: Clement Stone

daily.text: The illusion of purpose and design is perhaps the most pervasive illusion about nature that science has to confront on a daily basis.
daily.author: Lawrence M. Krauss

daily.text: Many losses have gone sinking daily by our inability to recognize the great deal of power reserved in us. Watch out and make it real because soon, it's going to be your turn to shine!
daily.author: Israelmore Ayivor

daily.text: Teaching does allow me to keep one foot in the youthful waters I tend to occupy in my novels, so I'm thankful for that. My students also remind me on a daily basis that the stories I collected during my district attorney days are actually interesting to people who haven't had that experience.
daily.author: Alafair Burke

daily.text: Our investigation has found that, unlike traditional fantasy sports, daily fantasy sports companies are engaged in illegal gambling under New York law, causing the same kinds of social and economic harms as other forms of illegal gambling and misleading New York consumers.
daily.author: Eric Schneiderman

daily.text: We can bring positive energy into our daily lives by smiling more, talking to strangers in line, replacing handshakes with hugs, and calling our friends just to tell them we love them.
daily.author: Brandon Jenner

daily.text: In the morning, I use a Philosophy cleanser and Olay Regenerist Daily 3 Point Treatment Cream, which sinks in well and feels firming. I rarely wear foundation, so cotton wool soaked in warm water is often enough to cleanse at night, but I take off eye make-up with Klorane's cornflower-infused remover.
daily.author: Saffron Aldridge

daily.text: It used to upset me - now it makes me sad - to see people use patriotism and our troops as a pawn in their political argument. Because I know personally, growing up in a military family, the sacrifice that is made on a daily basis.
daily.author: Tamron Hall

daily.text: My hope fuels my determination to overcome any difficulty.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: Sometimes the best helping hand you can get is a good, firm push.
daily.author: Joann Thomas

daily.text: Nurture your Dream everyday. A strong dream will empower you to take bold decisions and allow you to follow your heart.
daily.author: Manoj Arora

daily.text: Failure is a sign post, directing the right road for life’s journey.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: Successful writing is a slow, daily, meticulous form of mental illness.
daily.author: Don Roff

daily.text: Be grateful for the day and the day will be grateful for you. Stay positive and everything around you will respond in kind.
daily.author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

daily.text: The wisdom of God's Word is quite clear on believers being unequally yoked. And marrying someone who is not a Christian - who is not a daily disciple of Christ - is being unequally yoked, regardless of what their beliefs might be.
daily.author: Pat Robertson

daily.text: Special Super Bowl Wisdom of the Ages: 'Tom Brady's balls' Nothing more than a publicity stunt to keep the NFL Network from losing San Francisco's market share.
daily.author: Matthew Heines

daily.text: We are grateful for a happy marriage and a glorious future. Four years of a happy marriage! Happy Anniversary my dearest husband, Jeremiah Nii Mama Akita! I love you with all my heart, soul and body.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: Every day were reborn.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: Until you prove what is in you, what is in you shall always be what is in you.
daily.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

daily.text: The Civil Rights Act of 1964 laid the foundation for the Voting Rights Act of 1965, but it also addressed nearly every other aspect of daily life in a would-be free democratic society.
daily.author: Aberjhani

wanderlust.text: One soft humid early spring morning driving a winding road across Mount Tamalpais, the 2,500-foot mountain just north of the Golden Gate Bridge, a bend reveals a sudden vision of San Francisco in shades of blue, a city in a dream, and I was filled with a tremendous yearning to live in that place of blue hills and blue buildings, though I do live there, I had just left there after breakfast.
wanderlust.author: Rebecca Solnit

wanderlust.text: And if travel is like love, it is, in the end, mostly because it’s a heightened state of awareness, in which we are mindful, receptive, in dimmed by familiarity and ready to be transformed. That is why the best trips, like the best love affairs, never really end.
wanderlust.author: Pico Iyer

wanderlust.text: ..Luxury is the enemy of observation, a costly indulgence that induces such a good feeling that you notice nothing. Luxury spoils and infantilizes you and prevents you from knowing the world. That is its purpose, the reason why luxury cruises and great hotels are full of fatheads who, when they express an opinion, seem as though they are from another planet. It was also my experience that one of the worst aspects of travelling with wealthy people, apart from the fact that the rich never listen, is that they constantly groused about the high cost of living – indeed, the rich usually complained of being poor.
wanderlust.author: Paul Theroux

wanderlust.text: I am a world of uncertainties disguised as a girl.
wanderlust.author: Nicole Lyons

wanderlust.text: Nostalgia in reverse, the longing for yet another strange land, grew especially strong in spring.
wanderlust.author: Vladimir Nabokov

wanderlust.text: Life's trials will test you, and shape you, but don’t let them change who you are.”~ Aaron Lauritsen, ‘100 Days Drive.
wanderlust.author: Aaron Lauritsen

wanderlust.text: It might be well enough to wander if you've a place and people to come back to, but I tell you now there's no desolation like wanting to go home and truly not knowing where it is.
wanderlust.author: Elizabeth Kerner

wanderlust.text: All night, after the exhausting games of canasta, we would look over the immense sea, full of white-flecked and green reflections, the two of us leaning side by side on the railing, each of us far away, flying in his own aircraft to the stratospheric regions of his own dreams. There we understood that our vocation, our true vocation, was to move for eternity along the roads and seas of the world. Always curious, looking into everything that came before our eyes, sniffing out each corner but only ever faintly--not setting down roots in any land or staying long enough to see the substratum of things the outer limits would suffice.
wanderlust.author: Ernesto Che Guevara

wanderlust.text: I hope you know that you are not alone, and in those hours when you feel that you are, just know there are other people out there — singing the same melodies of wanderlust, climbing over mountains in the dark, and waking in the night to stare at the moon, thinking of this large world and dreaming — just like you.
wanderlust.author: Apex

wanderlust.text: Everytime I share Jesus Christ, I feel like a superhero!
wanderlust.author: Jane Bulos

wanderlust.text: It was the inverse of an island in the sea.
wanderlust.author: Elisabeth Eaves

wanderlust.text: The geographical pilgrimage is the symbolic acting out an inner journey. The inner journey is the interpolation of the meanings and signs of the outer pilgrimage. One can have one without the other. It is best to have both.
wanderlust.author: Thomas Merton

wanderlust.text: We are all pilgrims who seek Italy.
wanderlust.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

wanderlust.text: I dont live in a fantasy; just a dream, that's to hard for some to believe.
wanderlust.author: Nikki Rowe

wanderlust.text: A wave of saudade swept over me as I realized home never existed at all. The concept of home felt far from my reach, and I felt sick with longing.
wanderlust.author: M.B. Dallocchio

wanderlust.text: Summer is leaving silently. Much like a traveler approaching the end of an amazing journey.
wanderlust.author: Darnell Lamont Walker

wanderlust.text: It is so gratifying to tell so many stories my eye can romance with, that I become the stories.They shall live on after me, and in that way it makes me immortal.
wanderlust.author: Deejay Kapil

wanderlust.text: Without struggle, success has no value.
wanderlust.author: Aaron Lauritsen

wanderlust.text: What is a Wanderess? Bound by no boundaries, contained by no countries, tamed by no time, she is the force of nature’s course.
wanderlust.author: Roman Payne

wanderlust.text: Will I ever get over the pull I feel to both of these places?
wanderlust.author: Sara Ferguson

wanderlust.text: I keep going backas if I'm looking for something I have lostback to the motherland, sisterland, fatherlandback to the beacon, the breastthe smell and taste of the breeze,and the singing of the rain.
wanderlust.author: Heather Nova

wanderlust.text: The beauty he saw in her was the beauty she forgot to see in herself and what a beautiful reminder, that love is what will see us all through.
wanderlust.author: Nikki Rowe

wanderlust.text: The fear of rape puts many women in their place - indoors, intimidated, dependent yet again on material barriers and protectors... I was advised to stay indoors at night, to wear baggy clothes, to cover or cut my hair, to try to look like a man, to move someplace more expensive, to take taxis, to buy a car, to move in groups, to get a man to escort me—all modern versions of Greek walls and Assyrian veils, all asserting it was my responsibility to control my own and men's behavior rather than society's to ensure my freedom. I realized that many women had been so successfully socialized to know their place that they had chosen more conservative, gregarious lives without realizing why. The very desire to walk alone had been extinguished in them—but it had not in me.
wanderlust.author: Rebecca Solnit

wanderlust.text: Explore, Experience, Then Push Beyond.
wanderlust.author: Aaron Lauritsen

wanderlust.text: She's an old soul with young eyes, a vintage heart, and a beautiful mind.
wanderlust.author: Nicole Lyons

wanderlust.text: Alone in the car with my social life all before and behind me, I was suspended in the beautiful solitude of the open road, in a kind of introspection that only outdoor space generates, for inside and outside are more intertwined than the usual distinctions allow. The emotion stirred by the landscape is piercing, a joy close to pain when the blue is deepest on the horizon or the clouds are doing those spectacular fleeting things so much easier to recall than to describe.
wanderlust.author: Rebecca Solnit

wanderlust.text: It's time to change my life and see the world.
wanderlust.author: Jennifer Coletta

wanderlust.text: Travel is life-changing. That's the promise made by a thousand websites and magazines, by philosophers and writers down the ages. Mark Twain said it was fatal to prejudice, and Thomas Jefferson said it made you wise. Anais Nin observed that 'we travel, some of us forever, to seek other states, other lives, other souls.' It's all true. Self-transformation is what I sought and what I found.
wanderlust.author: Elisabeth Eaves

wanderlust.text: You have to keep doing it, Even if no one is watching. The best artists, are those Who live from their expressions, Not chasing the impressions.
wanderlust.author: Nikki Rowe

wanderlust.text: I'm sorry! I really am! I wanted to get out of this place! I want to live! I want to get away from here and never see it again! I hate everything about it!'You will hate the next place, too,' I said. 'What you are you will carry with you.
wanderlust.author: Louis L'Amour

motivational.text: The reason we have such a difficult time losing weight permanently is not because we are making bad choices, but because we are not stopping our automatic subconscious programmed behaviors in their tracks.
motivational.author: Elaine Moran

motivational.text: Don't lose heart, we're just rusty angels.
motivational.author: Stefan Emunds

motivational.text: There is a root to every action, which is really a reaction to what is going on inside of us.
motivational.author: Tanya R. Liverman

motivational.text: People with vision sees opportunity where there is problem. They see money not problem.
motivational.author: Patience Johnson

motivational.text: With every step we take we have a choice to make. Our choices determine our actions. Our actions determine who we are.
motivational.author: Randall Marr

motivational.text: To become a better you, remember to be grateful to people who have contributed to making you who you are today.
motivational.author: Israelmore Ayivor

motivational.text: The holy country is occupied by holy citizens.
motivational.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

motivational.text: Five minutes after something happened might not be the best time for you to get into your Facebook and tell everybody. Men's panic does not produce God's power.
motivational.author: Patience Johnson

motivational.text: Life is a journey, a ride of endless means and emotions.
motivational.author: Mary V. Pate

motivational.text: Not getting a straight answer is a straight answer.
motivational.author: Sarvesh Jain

motivational.text: Gratitude builds a bridge to abundance.
motivational.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivational.text: You are God’s image.
motivational.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

motivational.text: The only person you should ever fear losing in a relationship is you yourself.
motivational.author: Miya Yamanouchi

motivational.text: ‪I Have No Sympathy For Gossip Boys & Girls ‬.
motivational.author: Genereux Philip

motivational.text: The strength of the spirit sustains the soul.
motivational.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

motivational.text: Keep your promises and be consistent. Be the kind of person others can trust.
motivational.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivational.text: The single greatest cause of happiness is gratitude.
motivational.author: Auliq-Ice

motivational.text: No wrong in aiming or applauding the win but always agnize one's efforts.
motivational.author: Mohith Agadi

motivational.text: If you cannot find the distinctive opportunities you want, you can create the distinctive opportunities you want but you can't find!
motivational.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

motivational.text: When a lion kills a deer it does not build negative KARMA, its meant that way!!!!
motivational.author: Harrish Sairaman

motivational.text: What trumps the 'How' of Leadership is the 'Why.
motivational.author: Todd Stocker

motivational.text: Christians sometimes make themselves into elephants afraid of mice. You have the Creator of the universe on your side; not to mention, you've been given eternal life. 'Whom or what shall you fear?' To be afraid of anything other than God himself is like an insult to God.
motivational.author: Criss Jami

motivational.text: Persevere like a seed; even when people try to bury you, flourish.
motivational.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

motivational.text: Data has no ego and makes an excellent co-pilot.
motivational.author: Jay Samit

motivational.text: Take all of your wasted honorEvery little past frustrationTake all of your so-called problems,Better put 'em in quotations.
motivational.author: John Mayer

motivational.text: Success sits on a mountain of mistakes.
motivational.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

motivational.text: I remember a time in a class on a cold winter morning a Japanese girl came with a surgical mask & I thought “wow people would go to extremes NOT to get sick in Japan” afterwards on a break I approached her & asked in a cynical manner: why the mask? Are you afraid of catching a cold? & then she said “in Japan you use it when YOU are under the weather & you don’t want other people to get sick, it is the polite thing to do” wow! That's a lesson I will never forget.
motivational.author: Pablo

love.text: She was learning something important: how to live within the sound of her own slow breathing, how to love the view when her eyes were shut.
love.author: Gwendoline Riley

love.text: Break my heart and you will find yourself inside.
love.author: Atticus Poetry

love.text: In some aspects losing a child is like a wall, but instead of getting over it, you must carry the wall with you, wherever you go, for as long as you live.The wall is immovable.You can’t go anywhere until you learn to move the wall.You are just stuck in the same place, forever.You can tug and tug all you want, there are days that the wall will not move.And there are days that it moves ever so slightly.Over time I have realized that in order to move forward, knowing that I must bring this wall with me, that the best way to do so is to metaphorically flood the soil near the wall with water, and have the wall float with me, instead of me having to carry it.Every act of love and kindness turns to water.Water and love can penetrate and move anything.It just takes time. I need to turn my wall into a raft.
love.author: JohnA Passaro

love.text: Cassia.I know which life is my real one now, no matter what happens. It’s the one with you. For some reason, knowing that even one person knows my story makes things different. Maybe it’s like the poem says. Maybe this is my way of not going gentle.I love you. (Ky Markham).
love.author: Ally Condie

love.text: You know when you’re on a course that you know is the right one. You can’t explain it, you can’t define it, you don’t know how you got there or what all the obstacles will be, you just know the end result will be amazing and it will be worth it. That was the road I was on. Full speed ahead, no blinkers or turn signals, just cruise control.
love.author: Shelly Crane

love.text: And then there will be the times when I see you laughing. Like the time you’ll be playing with the neighbor’s puppy, poking your hands through the chain-link fence separating our back yards, and you’ll be laughing so hard you’ll start hiccupping. The puppy will run inside the neighbor’s house, and your laughter will gradually subside, letting you catch your breath. Then the puppy will come back to the fence to lick your fingers again, and you’ll shriek and start laughing again. It will be the most wonderful sound I could ever imagine, a sound that makes me feel like a fountain, or a wellspring.
love.author: Ted Chiang

love.text: Humans have a fraught relationship with beasts. They are our companions and our chattel, our family members and our laborers, our household pets and our household pests. We love them and cage them, admire them and abuse them. And, of course, we cook and eat them.
love.author: Jeffrey Kluger

love.text: We think we are so strong but it is only when others try to prey on our weaknesses that we realize how frail we truly are.”-Skyla (from Twiceborn).
love.author: JP Robinson

love.text: Love was not enough to fight or I was not worth for fight.
love.author: Arzum Uzun

love.text: I turn my head so that he doesn't see my smile and secretly curse him for making me feel special.
love.author: Kasie West

love.text: He had never smoked but then had he ever loved? Life made him love and love made him smoke.
love.author: Faraaz Kazi

love.text: I laughed as we turned in a tight circle... 'Tonight you're all mine.'Jake smiled but looked me dead in the eye. 'No. From now on.'My heart skipped. 'What?'Yours,' he said simply, 'from now on.
love.author: Kieran Scott

love.text: We have to consciously study how to be tender with each other until it becomes a habit because what was native has been stolen from us, the love of Black women for each other.
love.author: Audre Lorde

love.text: Five minutes after something happened might not be the best time for you to get into your Facebook and tell everybody. Men's panic does not produce God's power.
love.author: Patience Johnson

love.text: I remember how amazing it felt to be loved my him and how he was all I ever wanted.
love.author: Siobhan Davis

love.text: Don't compare your story to a movie or a book because it is written by a script writer and yours by God.
love.author: Anonymous

love.text: Better is a dinner of herbs where love is  than a stalled ox and hatred therewith.
love.author: Proverbs

love.text: As I have said, you have no reason to trust me, and an excellent reason not to.
love.author: Robin McKinley

love.text: Those who are devoted to amusements; who love the society of those who love pleasure, have an aversion to religious exercises.
love.author: Ellen G. White

love.text: Love finds you, not the other way around, and you can’t run from it.
love.author: Dianna Hardy

love.text: They did not use the sonic stunners but the foray gun, the ancient weapon that fires a set of metal fragments in a burst. They shot to kill him. He was dying when I got to him, sprawled and twisted away from his skis that stuck up out of the snow, his chest half shot away. I took his head in my arms and spoke to him, but he never answered me; only in a way he answered my love for him, crying out through the silent wreck and tumult of his mind as consciousness lapsed, in the unspoken tongue, once, clearly, 'Arek!' Then no more. I held him, crouching there in the snow, while he died. They let me do that. Then they made me get up, and took me off one way and him another, I going to prison and he into the dark.
love.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

love.text: It is well to believe that there needs but a little more thought, a little more courage, more love, more devotion to life, a little more eagerness, one day to fling open wide the portals of joy and of truth.
love.author: Maurice Maeterlinck

love.text: If your heart truly stops when she looks at you, how come you are still alive?
love.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

love.text: We did all the tourist crap, but I just wanted to sit in a cafe and watch people.
love.author: Sara Shepard

love.text: Apparently there were seven stages of grief but that was a neat way of putting it. Grief was messy and didn't colour inside the lines.
love.author: Emily Gale

love.text: No one is to blame because there is no one other than you. Nothing is to disrespect because there is nothing other than you.
love.author: Amit Ray

love.text: Love will let you want and trust in Miracles.
love.author: Prakash Hegade

love.text: A great giftwe can giveto ourselvesis a willingnessto love everyone,no matter what.This frees us completely from the toxicjustificationswe use to hate.
love.author: Scott Stabile

love.text: Your mind is the most powerful magnet. What you think, you attract.
love.author: Debasish Mridha

love.text: Her hands warming on tea looked like chunks of knitting a child had felted in grubby palms. Enough decades, and a body slowly twists into one great cramp, but there was a time once, where she had been sexy, and if not sexy, at least odd-looking enough to compel. Through this clear window she could see how good it all had been. She had no regrets. That's not true, Mathilde. The whisper in the ear. Oh, Christ, yes, there was one. Solitary, gleaming, a regret. It was that all her life she had said no. From the beginning she had let so few people in. That first night, his young face glowing up a hers in the black light, bodies beating the air around them, and inside there was that unexpected sharp recognition, oh, this. A sudden peace arriving for her. She who hadn't been at peace since she was so little. Out of nowhere, out of this surprising night with its shatters of lightning and the stormy black campus outside, with the heat and song and sex and animal fear inside. He had seen her and made the leap and swung through the crowd and taken her hand, this bright boy who was giving her a place to rest. He offered not only his whole laughing self, the past that build him and the warm beating body that moved her with its beauty and the future she felt compressed and waiting, but also the torch he carried before him in the dark, his understanding, dazzling, instant, that there was goodness at her core. With the gift came the bitter seed of regret, the unbridgeable gap between the Mathilde she was and the Mathilde he had seen her to be. A question, in the end, of vision. She wished she'd been the kind Mathilde, the good one, his idea of her. She would have looked smiling down at him, she would've heard beyond marry me to the world that spun behind the words. There would have been no pause, no hesitation. She would've laughed, touched his face for the first time, felt his warmth in the palm of her hand.'Yes,' she would've said. 'Sure.
love.author: Lauren Groff

happiness.text: To promote peace, promote understanding. To promote understanding, promote love.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: Happiness is the interval between periods of unhappiness.
happiness.author: Don Marquis

happiness.text: I don’t remember now who took the photo of us, but I’ve had it in my room for years. We’re leaning out of our windows and we’re laughing at each other with joyfulness purer than anything to do with the polite smiling you get used to doing when you get older. The photo has the kind of proper smiles that happen when you’re looking straight into the face of someone who’s been your best friend for a long time.
happiness.author: Sarah Moore Fitzgerald

happiness.text: When you are focused on what you're doing, you are not going to miss the next opportunity ... It's more likely that you get more!
happiness.author: Stephen Richards

happiness.text: Happiness is in our own hearts. I have no regrets of anything in the past. I'm totally cheerful and happy, and I think that a lot of your attitude is not in the circumstances you find yourself in, but in the circumstances you make for yourself.
happiness.author: Maeve Binchy

happiness.text: People who have wellbeing and feel fulfilled, need far less than people who feel unfulfilled, who always seem to need more.' By Rethinking Your Mindset you can create SWIFT sustainable success.
happiness.author: Tony Dovale

happiness.text: It is painful those feelings of pain,but accept it with love to see the gain.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: Manifest kindness to embrace greatness.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: Love is the moonlight when the moon is your heart.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: One could be happy not only without love, but despite it.
happiness.author: Gabriel García Márquez

happiness.text: We cannot really love anybody with whom we never laugh.
happiness.author: Agnes Repplier

happiness.text: Democracy is probably the only discovery by mankind which mostly brought it only happiness.
happiness.author: Amit Kalantri

happiness.text: Happiness is an awareness—a blissful perception, not in ownership or in material possessions.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: Failure is a signpost on the trail to success.
happiness.author: Phillip Gary Smith

happiness.text: The single greatest cause of happiness is gratitude.
happiness.author: Auliq-Ice

happiness.text: I cannot think that man is meant to find happiness so easily! Happiness is like one of those palaces on an enchanted island, its gates guarded by dragons. One must fight to gain it; and, in truth, I do not know what I have done to deserve the good fortune of becoming Mercédès, husband.
happiness.author: Alexandre Dumas

happiness.text: Ink runs from the corners of my mouth.There is no happiness like mine.I have been eating poetry.
happiness.author: Mark Strand

happiness.text: We want so badly to be happy – to live the kinds of lives that we always hoped we’d live – that we give gifts to ourselves by remembering things not as they were, but as we wish they were.
happiness.author: Dathan Auerbach

happiness.text: The magic of love is that it becomes our memory which we never can forget.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: Wanting help, I reached out to serve. Seeking happiness, I smiled and offered comfort. Yearning for love, I showed love. And now I understand. My life was never about me, it was always about you.
happiness.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

happiness.text: A smile puts you on the right track. A smile makes the world a beautiful place. When you lose your smile, you lose your way in the chaos of life.
happiness.author: Roy T. Bennett

happiness.text: All in good time is something Cosmic Ordering does not follow.
happiness.author: Stephen Richards

happiness.text: Your mind is the most powerful magnet. What you think, you attract.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: Let us be kind and compassionate to all beings. Everyone wants to enjoy their lives, everyone has sufferings, and everyone wants peace and happiness.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: The body is doing the action, body’s spare-parts are doing the action and the egoism simply does the egoism of, ‘I did’! Subtle-pride of egoism is created from this doer-ship and one is living due entirely on this basis. He simply tastes the subtle-pride of doer-ship; ‘I did’, ‘I suffered this pain’, ‘I enjoyed that happiness’. The person who gets rid of this subtle-pride will get freedom. Why does one taste this sweetness of subtle-pride of doership from infinite lives? He does this because he has never before tasted the sweetness of the Soul.
happiness.author: Dada Bhagwan

happiness.text: And then there will be the times when I see you laughing. Like the time you’ll be playing with the neighbor’s puppy, poking your hands through the chain-link fence separating our back yards, and you’ll be laughing so hard you’ll start hiccupping. The puppy will run inside the neighbor’s house, and your laughter will gradually subside, letting you catch your breath. Then the puppy will come back to the fence to lick your fingers again, and you’ll shriek and start laughing again. It will be the most wonderful sound I could ever imagine, a sound that makes me feel like a fountain, or a wellspring.
happiness.author: Ted Chiang

happiness.text: Kahneman’s evidence shows that we suck at remembering and predicting our own well-being. We as a culture still ignore this empirical evidence, recommending to live our lives so as to avoid deathbed regrets. Deathbed regrets are like Hollywood films: they stir passions for a couple hours, but are poorly connected to reality. They are not good criteria for a well-lived life.
happiness.author: Nick Winter

happiness.text: I like to believe that you don't need to reach a certain goal to be happy. I prefer to think that happiness is always there, and that when things don't go the way we might like them to, it's a sign from above that something even better is right around the corner.
happiness.author: David Archuleta

happiness.text: When you are in doubt and lost, to find the way, chose love.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: It is indisputable that the being whose capacities of enjoyment are low, has the greatest chance of having them fully satisfied; and a highly endowed being will always feel that any happiness which he can look for, as the world is constituted, is imperfect. But he can learn to bear its imperfections, if they are at all bearable; and they will not make him envy the being who is indeed unconscious of the imperfections, but only because he feels not at all the good which those imperfections qualify.  Dissatisfied than a fool satisfied. And if the fool, or the pig, is of a different opinion, it is only because they only know their own side of the question.
happiness.author: John Stuart Mill

positive.text: Trust men and they will be true to you  treat them greatly and they will show themselves great.
positive.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

positive.text: At the end of the day, the most overwhelming key to a child's success is the positive involvement of parents.
positive.author: Jane D. Hull

positive.text: Change of heart comes from the Creator.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Live every day in the full expression of God’s grace in this coming year.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Any path is only a path  and there is no affront  to oneself or to others  in dropping it if that is what your heart tells you.
positive.author: Carlos Castaneda

positive.text: If you are given a chance to be a role model, I think you should always take it because you can influence a person's life in a positive light, and that's what I want to do. That's what it's all about.
positive.author: Tiger Woods

positive.text: He who cannot change the very fabric of his thought will never be able to change reality.
positive.author: Anwar Sadat

positive.text: The science of psychology has been far more successful on the negative than on the positive side... It has revealed to us much about man's shortcomings, his illnesses, his sins, but little about his potentialities, his virtues, his achievable aspirations, or his psychological health.
positive.author: Abraham Maslow

positive.text: They were so strong in their beliefs that there came a time when it hardly mattered what exactly those beliefs were  they all fused into a single stubbornness.
positive.author: Louise Erdrich

positive.text: You can make a difference, wherever you are. It begins with a decision and defined purpose.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Doubt breeds doubt.
positive.author: Franz Grillparzer

positive.text: I will sacrifice today for tomorrow.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: My hope fuels my determination to overcome any difficulty.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: You may encounter many disappointments. Be strong. Tell yourself, “I am good enough, I will try again.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Fear robs you of your freedom to make the right choice in life that can bridge the gap between where you are and where you want to be. On the other side of fear, lies freedom. If you want to grow, you need to be brave and take risks. If you're not uncomfortable, you're not growing.
positive.author: Roy T. Bennett

positive.text: Don’t be a victim of circumstances. Choose victory by gracious endurance.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: A positive attitude is most easily arrived at through a deliberate and rational analysis of what’s required to manifest unwavering positive thought patterns. First, reflect on the actual, present condition of your mind. In other words, is the mind positive or not? We’ve all met individuals who perceive themselves as positive people but don’t appear as such. Since the mind is both invisible and intangible, it’s therefore easier to see the accurate characteristics of the mind through a person’s words, deeds, and posture.For example, if we say, “It’s absolutely freezing today! I’ll probably catch a cold before the end of the day!” then our words expose a negative attitude. But if we say, “The temperature is very cold” (a simple statement of fact), then our expressions, and therefore attitude, are not negative. Sustaining an alert state in which self-awareness becomes possible gives us a chance to discover the origins of negativity. In doing so, we also have an opportunity to arrive at a state of positiveness, so that our words and deeds are also positive, making others feel comfortable, cheerful, and inspired.
positive.author: H.E. Davey

positive.text: Great things happen to those who don't stop believing, trying, learning, and being grateful.
positive.author: Roy T. Bennett

positive.text: You have the power to realise your dream. If only you are willing and determined.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: The mightiest flame of fire lies positive mindset.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Dwell on positive thoughts!
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: The greater part of our happiness or misery depends on our dispositions  and not our circumstances.
positive.author: Martha Washington

positive.text: The pessimist sees the difficulty in every opportunity  the optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty.
positive.author: L. P. Jacks

positive.text: When God gives you an idea, you must act immediately on it.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Not every problem can be solved. Some are okay simply to avoid. Go around the, go under them, whatever it takes to reach your higher goal. Sometimes you have to fail your way to success.
positive.author: Anna Mitchael

positive.text: Whenever you encounter any fearful situation, there exists a great possibility for you to triumph only if you be willing enough to conquer the fear.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: To the voices in our heads that tell us we aren't good enough: do be quiet.
positive.author: Carrie Hope Fletcher

positive.text: Where the world only sees a seed, an optimist sees a tree.
positive.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

positive.text: Dare to love greatly.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: We can only reach the highest height, if we encourage each other.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: Love, Mercy, and Grace, sisters all, attend your wounds of silence and hope.
strength.author: Aberjhani

strength.text: All through my life, I have been tested. My will has been tested, my courage has been tested, my strength has been tested. Now my patience and endurance are being tested.
strength.author: Muhammad Ali

strength.text: My expectations were reduced to zero when I was 21. Everything since then has been a bonus.', December 12, 2004)].
strength.author: Stephen Hawking

strength.text: The strength of the spirit sustains the soul.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: Endure despite the pain. The key is grace of strength.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: Luck is for those with nothing else. I wish you strength and courage.
strength.author: Annette Marie

strength.text: Trust your instincts, follow your bliss, make plans, work hard, learn to let things go. Don’t be late. Remember that fortune favors the brave. Live. If you need to run, try and run toward something. Study for tests. Laugh at silly cartoons. Be organized. If you fall seven times, get up eight. Always carry an extra pen. Believe you can do everything. Find your key.
strength.author: Nina Lane

strength.text: Most physical battles begin once mental ones have been lost, anyway. Conquer the mind, conquer the body.
strength.author: A.J. Darkholme

strength.text: We think we are so strong but it is only when others try to prey on our weaknesses that we realize how frail we truly are.”-Skyla (from Twiceborn).
strength.author: JP Robinson

strength.text: What! Would I be turned back from doing a thing that I had determined to do, and that I knew to be right, by the airs and interference of such a person, or any person I may say? No, I have no idea of being so easily persuaded. When I have made up my mind, I have made it.
strength.author: Jane Austen

strength.text: Courage is the power to let go of the familiar.
strength.author: Raymond Lindquist

strength.text: Tell me, who have never be knocked down by life’s circumstances?
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: But we are strong, each in our purpose, and we are all more strong together.
strength.author: Bram Stoker

strength.text: In a fit of anger he had said to her, 'You'll always be miserable,' to which she thoughtfully replied, 'Is that so? It's impossible to be miserable when you've known tragedy and hardship. Both strengthen and refine a person to the point where they may have moments of grief and sadness, but misery is known only to those who have a sense of entitlement...You know, people like you.
strength.author: Donna Lynn Hope

strength.text: Cassia.I know which life is my real one now, no matter what happens. It’s the one with you. For some reason, knowing that even one person knows my story makes things different. Maybe it’s like the poem says. Maybe this is my way of not going gentle.I love you. (Ky Markham).
strength.author: Ally Condie

strength.text: He knows not his own strength that hath not met adversity.
strength.author: Ben Jonson

strength.text: People with vision sees opportunity where there is problem. They see money not problem.
strength.author: Patience Johnson

strength.text: Christians sometimes make themselves into elephants afraid of mice. You have the Creator of the universe on your side; not to mention, you've been given eternal life. 'Whom or what shall you fear?' To be afraid of anything other than God himself is like an insult to God.
strength.author: Criss Jami

strength.text: Keep your fears to yourself, but share your courage with others.
strength.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

strength.text: My spouse is my shield, my spouse is my strength.
strength.author: Amit Kalantri

strength.text: Strength is not defined by the load you bear, it’s defined by the amount you can bend before breaking.
strength.author: Blake Mays

strength.text: Neither super strength, nor telepathy, nor flight, nor telekinesis, nor any aberrant ability will ever be as great as the innate ability that a woman has when she is able to control her own mind.
strength.author: Kenn Bivins

strength.text: We can only reach the highest height, if we encourage each other.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: Audiences will admire your character’s strength but connect with them through their weakness.
strength.author: Don Roff

strength.text: If you let tragedy change you, You have already lost.
strength.author: Nikki Rowe

strength.text: Sic vis pacem para bellum - if you want peace, prepare for war.
strength.author: A.J. Darkholme

strength.text: Politics doesn’t mean playing deceitful and trickery games against the people, it means playing resourceful and organized games for the people.
strength.author: Amit Kalantri

strength.text: Etta saw the way Sophia took a deep breathe, set her shoulders back, and moved with practiced grace on her way out — and she understood something about the other girl, truly understood for the first time. Sophia wanted it, when she was only ever sent out.
strength.author: Alexandra Bracken

strength.text: God seemed to be having a hard time killing him, and he'd be damned if he was going to make the job easy for mere mortals.
strength.author: Mario Puzo

strength.text: Man's delight in the Lord is the absolute peak of human triumph. He praises God when full of joy, and when not, he praises God to become full of joy. For to know and to live as though God is worthy of all praise, in all one's circumstances, whether seemingly good or seemingly bad, is the primary definition of joy and the richest triumph for man under God.
strength.author: Criss Jami
